concept.title: Structure panel
concept.shortdesc: The Structure panel enables you to view and select drawing content from a structured tree.

section.title: Menu
section.p: Displays the Structure panel main menu.

section.title: Configure Structure Tree
section.p: Displays the Configure structure tree dialog box.

section.title: Search
section.p: Searches the structure tree for character strings that match what you enter.

section.title: Content tree
section.p: Displays a structured tree view of the drawing content. The configuration of the structure tree is defined in a .CST file and specified by the STRUCTURETREECONFIG system variable. The location of CST files is specified by the SRCHPATH system variable. You can create custom CST files to meet your needs.
A right-click menu on a tree node or on an entity offers relevant tools.
